name: VR Medieval Adventure: 360 Ride
description:
Head-spinning 3D ride will carry away you to the world of improbable adventures in 360 degrees. You will be able to plunge into the unknown worlds, to meet a giant and Cyclop, to become the participant of a knightly tournament. You will find a storm of thrills!

Features:
*4 kind of medieval world
*VR based 3D Environment
*Stunning graphics and outstanding audio

How to Play:
To control your movement you have to rotate your head with VR headset on your head.

VR Medieval Adventure: 360 Ride is compatible with all virtual reality devices:
Homido VR
Archos VR
Dive VR
FreeFly VR
FIBRUM VR
Cmoar
Vrase
Zeiss VR One
Lick VR
